description: Adverse possession claim with continuous occupation
facts: Alice has continuously occupied and maintained a parcel of land for 22 years
The occupation was open, notorious, and hostile to the true owner
Alice paid property taxes on the land
The statutory period for adverse possession is 20 years
asp_facts: claim(claim1). claimant(claim1, alice). property_type(claim1, land). occupation_years(claim1, 22). occupation_continuous(claim1, yes). occupation_open(claim1, yes). occupation_notorious(claim1, yes). occupation_hostile(claim1, yes). taxes_paid(claim1, yes). statutory_period(claim1, 20).
question: Has Alice acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Alice has satisfied all requirements for adverse possession: continuous, open, notorious, and hostile occupation for longer than the statutory period, plus payment of property taxes.
